page.title: 05BEENHAM C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: THE SCHOOL. THE ORIGINAL BUILDING WAS BURNED DOWN IN 1948 AND A TEMPORARY BUILDING WAS ERECTED ON THE SAME SITE. IN 1976 SUBSIDENCE CAUSED THE END OF THE SCHOOL TO SINK.RUMOURS OF A NEW SCHOOL WERE WHISPERED BUT IT WAS NOT UNTIL THIS YEAR THAT BUILDING WAS STARTED. THE NEW BUILDING IS ALMOST COMPLETE,SITED NEXT TO THE VICTORY HALL. IT IS SEMI OPEN PLAN,AN ADJOINING COMMUNITY AREA AND A SHARED HALL. IT IWLL TAKE 90 PUPILS. OF THE SCHOOL TO SINK. RUMOURS OF A NEW SCHOOL WERE WHISPERED BUT IT WAS NOT UNTIL THIS YEAR THAT BUILDING WAS STARTED. THE NEW BUILDING IS ALMOST COMPLETE,WITH AN ADJOINING COMMUNITY AREA AND A SHARED HALL.THE SCHOOL PASSED FROM THE CHURCH TO THE LOCAL AUTHORITY IN 1926.IT WILL BE NICE TO HAVE INDOOR TOILETS.
